snippet: Outside income has led to corruption, but it also means a Legislature with a veterinarian, an undertaker and a church organist, among other occupations.
abstract: Recent high-profile corruption trials of New York State legislators have prompted calls to end so-called outside income and make Legislature full-time job; many lawmakers who work in fields like undertaking or veterinary medicine find idea ridiculous as they see no conflict of interest between between their professions and their legislative work.
lead_paragraph: Outside income has led to corruption, but it also means a Legislature with a veterinarian, an undertaker and a church organist, among other occupations.

headline.main: Animals, Auctions and Death: Outside Albany, Some Lawmakers Serve Different Interests
headline.print_headline: In Albany, Outside Jobs From Pets to Funerals
